content.text:
The interior surfaces of the upper walls and dome of the building were originally covered with what? <image 1> <image 2>

A. sculptural decoration
B. frescoes
C. mosaics
D. stucco

The interior surfaces of the upper walls and dome of the building in Image 1, which appears to be the Hagia Sophia, were originally covered with mosaics. 

So, the correct answer is:

C. mosaics
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
